TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OutputConfiguration : Java.Lang.Object, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OutputConfiguration extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class OutputConfiguration Inherits Object Implements IDisposable, IJavaPeerable, IParcelable
public ref class OutputConfiguration sealed : Java::Lang::Object, Android::OS::IParcelable, IDisposable, Java::Interop::IJavaPeerable
type OutputConfiguration = class inherit Object interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: A class for describing camera output, which contains a Surface and its specific configuration for creating capture session.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Android.Views.Surface surface) cil managed

Docs.param:
A Surface for camera to output to.

This constructor creates a default configuration, with a surface group ID of #SURFACE_GROUP_ID_NONE.
Docs.summary: Create a new OutputConfiguration instance with a Surface.
